short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: hanukkahblog Calculator extension helps to perform basic and easy Maths Operations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hanukkahblog Calculator extension is simple popup calculator which performs basic math's specially beneficial for beginners. This calculator is provided by the team https://heatedgadget.com/ free of cost.
Must pin this extension and give an honest feedback.
Thanks.
